create_ks#cql: CREATE KEYSPACE helenus_cql3_test WITH strategy_class=SimpleStrategy AND strategy_options:replication_factor=1
create_cf#cql: CREATE COLUMNFAMILY cql_test (id text, foo text, PRIMARY KEY (id))
update#cql: UPDATE cql_test SET foo='bar' WHERE id='foobar'
select#cql: SELECT foo FROM cql_test WHERE id='foobar'
count#cql: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cql_test WHERE id='foobar'
countstar#cql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cql_test WHERE id='foobar'
